title: Bloomberg's Niquette Previews the Presidential Debate (Audio)

description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Mark Niquette, Politics and National Government reporter for Bloomberg News, on today's political news: Presidential debate preview.
